Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Find a source of water.', '2. Fill a cup with water.']

def has_water_source(item:item):
    # Function to check if an item is a source of water
    symbol has_water=has_water(item)
    return has_water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists item: item : has_water_source(item):
            # Check if there is a known item with a water source
            bind water_source: item where:
                has_water_source(water_source)
            # Select the water source
            achieve close_char(char, water_source) 
            # Move the character closer to the water source

        else:
            # If no known water source is found, initiate exploration
            foreach source: item:
                if has_water_source(source) and not visited(source):
                    # Check all unvisited possible water sources
                    observe(source, "Check if this is a source of water")
                    # Observe whether the item has a water source

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Find a cup.', '2. Fill the cup with water.']

def has_cup(item:item):
    # Function to check if an item is a cup
    symbol has_cup=is_cup(item)
    return has_cup

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists cup: item : has_cup(cup):
            # If we have already found a cup, approach it
            bind cup: item where:
                has_cup(cup)
            achieve close_char(char, cup)

        else:
            # Check all items in the scene that have not been visited to find a cup
            foreach item: item:
                if not visited(item):
                    observe(item,"Check if this item is a cup")

Goal Representation:
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and id[cup]==2063
        # Select the cup with the ID 2063

        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close_char(char, faucet)
        # Select a faucet close to the character

        fill_a_cup_with_water(cup, faucet)
        # Fill the selected cup with water using the faucet

behavior fill_a_cup_with_water(cup:item):
    body:
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, cup)
        # Ensure theres a water source close to the cup
        is_oil(cup) # Use the water source to fill the cup with water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and close_char(char, cup)
        # Select the cup that needs to be filled, close to you
        fill_a_cup_with_water(cup)

behavior fill_the_cup_with_water(cup: item, faucet: item, sink: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cup, sink)
        achieve_once close_char(char, faucet)
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        fill_a_cup_with_water(cup, faucet)
        achieve has_water(cup)
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and close_char(char, cup)
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and close_char(char, sink)
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
        fill_the_cup_with_water(cup, faucet, sink)
